title: Sort Total Orders by overdue days within each design code group

requirements.summary: Sort orders within each design code group by overdue days in descending order (most overdue first), with orders missing orderDate at the bottom
acceptanceCriteria: In Total Orders tab, orders are grouped by design code as before.
Within each design code group, the order with the highest overdue days (oldest orderDate) appears first.
Orders with no orderDate appear at the bottom of their respective design code group.
The sorting is applied consistently across all design code groups.
No existing features (search, filter, karigar, order type) are affected.

file_operations.description: Add sorting logic within each design code group to order items by overdue days in descending order. Calculate overdue days as the difference between the current date and the order's orderDate. Orders with null or missing orderDate should be placed at the bottom of each group. Apply this sorting after the existing grouping-by-design-code logic and before rendering the OrderTable component. Ensure all existing filtering (order type, karigar, search text) and selection features remain unchanged.
